title: List of films featuring Wing Chun
data: Cage demonstrates Wing Chun during the film
Wing Chun is one of two opposing schools
Primarily a comedy with a few fight scenes
Also known as Unbeatable Dragon , or in German , Das Höllentor der Shaolin

A semi-biographical tale of the Wing Chun grandmaster Ip Man during the invasion of his hometown in the second Sino-Japanese war . Donnie Yen trained with Ip Chun ( Ip Man 's son and a Wing Chun martial artist ) while preparing for his role

A semi-biographical story about events in Ip Man 's life following his migration to Hong Kong . Donnie Yen trained with Ip Chun ( a Wing Chun martial artist and Ip Man 's son ) while preparing for his role
Donnie Yen , Mike Tyson , Lynn Hung , Zhang Jin
When a band of brutal gangsters led by a crooked property developer make a play to take over the city , Master Ip is forced to take a stand
Max Zhang , Michelle Yeoh , Tony Jaa
Donnie Yen , Wu Yue , Scott Adkins
The Legend Is Born - Ip Man
A semi-biographical film during the young days of Ip Man . Ip Chun , Ip Man 's real son ( and Wing Chun instructor ) stars in the film as Ip Man 's master , Leung Bik
Chinese name : Bai ga jai . A popular pseudo-historical film about Wing Chun and featuring Wing Chun used in most of its fight scenes
Near the beginning of the movie , Keung ( Chan ) practices on a wooden training dummy commonly used in Wing Chun practice
Robert Downey , Jr. made use of Wing Chun ( along with sword fighting techniques , as well as Bartitsu ) to portray Sherlock Holmes as an efficient fighter in various fight scenes
Biho sangjaeng aka Stranger from Shaolin Alternative titles : Fist of flying tiger , Wing Chun Warriors , A fight between flying tigers , Fei hu xiang zheng
A young girl is the sole survivor of an attack on her temple . She learns taekwondo from a local merchant . Taking the name 'The Invincible Young-chun ' , she sets out on a quest for vengeance
Hong Kong martial arts action film
Sammo Hung , Bryan Leung , Casanova Wong
A film about Yim Wing Chun ( after whom Wing Chun Kung Fu was named ) . Fo Shan Zan xian sheng-Descendant of Wing Chun

A Tamil super hero film which is based on the chase and capture of a serial robber gang . The movie extensively used the Wing Chun style of fighting between the hero and the villain . The actors were trained by Tony Leung
section_text: This article possibly contains original research . Please improve it by verifying the claims made and adding inline citations . Statements consisting only of original research should be removed . ( August 2010 ) ( Learn how and when to remove this template message ) Stranger from Shaolin movie poster This is a list of films and television series which feature Wing Chun , a Chinese martial art , either as the main topic , a plot device , or give demonstration of the martial art .
intro: This is a list of films and television series which feature Wing Chun, a Chinese martial art, either as the main topic, a plot device, or give demonstration of the martial art.
